item.title: convolutional neural networks
item.description: A convolution is a [[thoughts/imaging#Linear Filters|linear filters]] that measures the effect one signal has on another signal. If $x$ is the $(n,n)$ input signal (image) and $w$ is the $(2m+1, 2m+1)$ filter, then the 2D convolution is given by
